    Dec 14, 2010

    What is Jekyll? This is going to be easy right? Is this the same as Wordpress? Starting out I had no idea what I was doing in Jekyll and could barely get it the simplest of css changes to work. This was far more confusing than I thought it was going to be. Before starting the challenging task of styling my blog, I thought, “I got this, it’s going to be so easy”.
